SEARCH
Package Prescription.Controller

Class PrescriptionController

java.lang.Object
Prescription.Controller.PrescriptionController
public class PrescriptionController extends Object
The PrescriptionController class provides static methods to manage prescriptions, including creating, updating, dispensing, and retrieving prescription details.

  • Constructor Details

    • PrescriptionController

      public PrescriptionController()

  • Method Details

    • createNewPrescription

      public static Prescription createNewPrescription(String doctorId, String patientId, String medicationName, String dosage, String status)
      Creates a new prescription object with the specified details. The ID is generated automatically.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      dosage - The dosage of the medication.
      status - The status of the prescription (e.g., "pending", "dispensed").
      Returns:
      A new Prescription object.

    • updatePrescription

      public static Prescription updatePrescription(Prescription prescription)
      Updates an existing prescription in the repository.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The Prescription object to update.
      Returns:
      The updated Prescription object.

    • dispensePrescription

      public static Prescription dispensePrescription(Prescription prescription)
      Dispenses a prescription and updates the inventory based on the medication dosage.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The Prescription object to dispense.
      Returns:
      The updated Prescription object after dispensing.

    • getPrescriptionById

      public static Prescription getPrescriptionById(String id)
      Retrieves a prescription by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the prescription.
      Returns:
      The Prescription object if found, or null otherwise.

    • createNewPendingPrescription

      public static Prescription createNewPendingPrescription(String doctorId, String patientId, String medicationName, String dosage, String appointmentId)
      Creates a new prescription with a default "pending" status.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      dosage - The dosage of the medication.
      appointmentId - The ID of the related appointment.
      Returns:
      A new Prescription object with "pending" status.

    • getAllPrescriptions

      public static List<Prescription> getAllPrescriptions()
      Retrieves all prescriptions stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all Prescription objects.

    • getAllPendingPrescriptions

      public static List<Prescription> getAllPendingPrescriptions()
      Retrieves all prescriptions with a "pending" status.
      Returns:
      A list of pending Prescription objects.

    • getAllDispensedPrescriptions

      public static List<Prescription> getAllDispensedPrescriptions()
      Retrieves all prescriptions with a "dispensed" status.
      Returns:
      A list of dispensed Prescription objects.

    • addPrescription

      public static Prescription addPrescription(Prescription prescription)
      Adds a new prescription to the repository.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The Prescription object to add.
      Returns:
      The added Prescription object if successful, or null otherwise.
